overview: For Hank Aaron. For Phil Niekro. For Braves Country. The Atlanta Braves are 2021 World Series champions, proving that it is anyoneâ€™s game once the Postseason begins by taking down the Houston Astros in a 6-game Fall Classic. The official World Series from Major League Baseball.
